glsa.title: Deluge: Remote execution of arbitrary code
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability in Deluge might allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code.

description.p: A CSRF vulnerability was discovered in the web UI of Deluge.

impact.p: A remote attacker could entice a user currently logged in into Deluge web UI to visit a malicious web page which uses forged requests to make Deluge download and install a Deluge plug-in provided by the attacker. The plug-in can then execute arbitrary code as the user running Deluge.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Deluge users should upgrade to the latest version:
